title: Into the Weeds: Critical Thinking with Jay Shapiro
description:
In this episode I chat with Jay Shapiro about his documentary Islam and the Future of Tolerance, how important it is to debate with an open mind, and his new project coming out mid June. We cover a variety of topics, including religion, abortion, and something I like to call "the Harambe problem". 

Follow Jay on twitter @jay_shapiro
Check out his film Islam and the Future of Tolerance here:
http://www.islamandthefutureoftolerance.com

Follow me here:
twitter: @theother_95
Instagram: @theother95
Facebook: @theother95page
Email me: theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
